attributes.action: Automatic deportation for any non UK citizen who commits a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: The UK and it's citizens should not be paying to house foreign migrants (EU included) in it's prisons, furthermore the right to reside in this country is a fantastic privilege and opportunity for those lucky enough to have it offered to them. Those that come to the UK and abuse that, should not be given a second chance and should have right to reside here removed from them indefinitely.
